news_header: Fourteen arrested in Europe for a €1tn money-laundering network linked to Russian mafia.
news_original_title: Russian mafia money-laundering ring broken up in Spain
news_text: In a series of raids across Spain and Portugal, fourteen individuals were arrested for their involvement in a €1tn criminal money-laundering network connected to Russian mafia groups. The operation laundered money from drug trafficking and used the 'Hawala' method for transfers. Over €1m in cash and cryptocurrencies were seized, and the gang was reportedly planning to expand operations to Cuba.
